title: When will the government allow the CBSE to reopen the schools? - Quora
tags: Central Board of Secondary Education, India

response.answer_text: According to Situation due to Covid-19, the 2020 was worst year of our life because peoples are not following Social Distancing and all.. But, just keep in mind School will not open this year because no one knowns what happens next.. This is 1 year Vaccation for Students according to current Situation of Coronaviruse

The central government has already allowed CBSE schools to reopen from Sept 21st 2020 for classes IX to XII. It is just the CBSE schools in Tamil Nadu who are not opening them since they want to save money by conducting online classes.
